channel.title: Alex Toussaint's feed
channel.description: Life can be much broader once you discover one simple fact: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you. And you can change it, you can influence it… Once you learn that, you'll never be the same again. ― Steve Jobs

item.title: PyRSS2Gen-0.0 released
item.description: Dalke Scientific today announced PyRSS2Gen-0.0, a library for generating RSS feeds for Python.

item.title: Thoughts on RSS feeds for bioinformatics
item.description: One of the reasons I wrote PyRSS2Gen was to experiment with RSS for data collection in bioinformatics. Last year I came across...
